column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: hour. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix : <http://www.semanticweb.org/ontology#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .: a owl:Ontology ;:Hour a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Hour" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents time in hours." .:TimePoint a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Time Point" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents a specific point in time." .:hasHour a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has hour" ;    rdfs:comment "Denotes that a time point has a particular hour." ;    rdfs:domain :TimePoint ;    rdfs:range :Hour .:Minute a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Minute" ;    rdfs:comment "Represents time in minutes." .:hasMinute a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:label "has minute" ;    rdfs:comment "Denotes that an hour has a particular number of minutes." ;    rdfs:domain :Hour ;    rdfs:range :Minute .```
